thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Pep Guardiola personally scouts Djibril Sidibe | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Pep Guardiola personally scouts Djibril Sidibe | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Pep Guardiola personally scouts Djibril Sidibe | Metro News
text:
Pep Guardiola personally scouts Arsenal and Manchester United target Djibril Sidibe gossip Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Sunday 12 Feb 2017 2:04 pm Djibril Sidibe has been in excellent form for Monaco (Picture: Getty) 
Pep Guardiola has personally scouted Arsenal and Manchester United target Djibril Sidibe as he considers a summer move for the defender. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
Arsenal were heavily linked with a move for the right-back in the summer before he opted to join Monaco. 
Sidibe has continued to impress at his new side with Monaco top of Ligue 1 and the defender missing just four league games. 
Le10 Sport claim Guardiola watched Sidibe from the stands last month as he looks to bolster his defensive options in the summer. Pep Guardiola will see the defender up close when Monaco in the Champions League (Picture: Getty)
